new System.Management.WqlEventQuery : string * TimeSpan -> System.Management.WqlEventQuery

param.name: eventClassName
param.span: 要查询的事件类的名称。

span.span: The name of the event class to query.

param.name: withinInterval
param.span: 值，它指定对于接收此事件而言所能接受的滞后时间。

span.span: A value specifying the latency acceptable for receiving this event.

param.span: 该值用于以下情况：对于所请求的查询没有显式事件提供程序，并且需要 WMI 轮询条件。

span.span: This value is used in cases where there is no explicit event provider for the query requested, and WMI is required to poll for the condition.

param.span: 该间隔是在必须发送事件通知之前可以经过的最长时间。

span.span: This interval is the maximum amount of time that can pass before notification of an event must be delivered.

summary.span: 使用指定滞后时间，为指定的事件类初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified event class, with the specified latency time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建事件查询： "SELECT \* *FROM __InstanceCreationEvent of* 10 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service"，后者发送**Win32_Service**实例创建通知，并提供10秒的轮询间隔.The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 10 WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_Service ", which sends notification of the creation of **Win32_Service** instances, with a 10-second polling interval. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建了事件查询： "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent 600 GROUP BY TargetInstance from. 具有 NumberOfEvents > 15" 的。从同一源收到的**Win32_NTLogEvent**事件超过15个。The following example creates the event query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent WHERE TargetInstance ISA Win32_NTLogEvent GROUP WITHIN 600 BY TargetInstance.SourceName HAVING NumberOfEvents > 15" which delivers aggregate events only if the number of **Win32_NTLogEvent** events received from the same source exceeds 15. [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/cs/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S/vb/WqlEventQuery-S_T_S_T_S_S.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用到指定类的事件的条件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied to events of the specified class.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含事件查询中的一个或多个条件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition or conditions in the event query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的条件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. ## 属性值Property Value 条件表示为字符串，其中包含以下形式的一个或多个子句： \ \<运算符 > \<值 > 与逻辑运算符组合在一起。The condition is represented as a string, containing one or more clauses of the form: \ \ \ combined with logical operators. \ 必须表示在此查询中指定的事件类上定义的属性。\ must represent a property defined on the event class specified in this query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化一个新的，并显示事件查询字符串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的分组。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new grouping. ## 属性值Property Value 如果无需分组，则为 Null;否则为事件属性名称的集合。Null, if no grouping is required; otherwise, a collection of event property names. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化一个新的，并显示事件查询字符串。The following example initializes a new and displays the event query string. summary.span: 获取或设置基于所接收事件的数目要应用到事件聚合的条件。

summary.span: 获取或设置此查询中要使用的轮询间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the polling interval to be used in this query.

value.span: 返回一个 值，该值包含用于事件查询的轮询间隔。

span.span: Returns a value containing the polling interval used in the event query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当没有请求事件的*事件提供程序*时，才应设置此属性，并且需要 WMI 轮询请求的条件。This property should only be set in cases where there is no *event provider* for the event requested, and WMI is required to poll for the requested condition. 设置此属性值将覆盖对象中存储的任何先前值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 重新生成查询字符串以反映新的间隔。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new interval. ## 属性值Property Value 如果不涉及轮询，则为 Null;否则，如果需要轮询，则为有效的值。Null, if there is no polling involved; otherwise, a valid value if polling is required. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 对直接调用方的完全信任。Full trust for the immediate caller. 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 有关详细信息，请参阅[从部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下面的示例初始化一个新的，它表示查询： "SELECT \* FROM *__InstanceCreationEvent FROM* TargetInstance Win32_Process"。The following example initializes a new that represents the query: "SELECT \* FROM __InstanceCreationEvent *WITHIN* 1 WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process'". [!code-csharp[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/cs/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval/vb/WqlEventQuery_WithinInterval.vb#1)]
